statements: SELECT * FROM PreciousMetalsInvestments
SELECT id, metal_type, current_market_value FROM PreciousMetalsInvestments ORDER BY current_market_value DESC
SELECT id, metal_type, purchase_date FROM PreciousMetalsInvestments WHERE purchase_price > 500
SELECT id, metal_type, storage_location FROM PreciousMetalsInvestments ORDER BY storage_location ASC
SELECT id, purchase_date, current_market_value FROM PreciousMetalsInvestments WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM PreciousMetalsInvestments WHERE metal_type = 'Gold' ORDER BY purchase_price DESC
SELECT id, purchase_date, current_market_value FROM PreciousMetalsInvestments WHERE storage_location LIKE '%Vault%'
SELECT metal_type, storage_location, purchase_price FROM PreciousMetalsInvestments ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT * FROM PreciousMetalsInvestments WHERE current_market_value > purchase_price
SELECT id, storage_location, current_market_value FROM PreciousMetalsInvestments WHERE purchase_price < 2000
SELECT * FROM PurchaseDetails;
SELECT metal_type, quantity FROM PurchaseDetails WHERE purchase_price > 100;
SELECT storage_location, storage_capacity FROM StorageInformation;
SELECT purchase_date, purchase_price FROM PurchaseDetails WHERE metal_type = 'Gold';
SELECT * FROM PurchaseDetails WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM PurchaseDetails WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT metal_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM PurchaseDetails GROUP BY metal_type HAVING SUM(quantity) > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseDetails WHERE purchase_price BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 AND metal_type = 'Gold';
SELECT purchase_date, SUM(purchase_price) AS total_price FROM PurchaseDetails GROUP BY purchase_date ORDER BY purchase_date;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseDetails WHERE metal_type = 'Silver' AND quantity > 50 AND purchase_price < 2000 ORDER BY purchase_price ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_details;
SELECT metal_type, purchase_price FROM purchase_details WHERE weight > 100;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, purchase_price FROM purchase_details ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT metal_type, storage_location, storage_cost FROM purchase_details JOIN storage_information ON purchase_details.purchase_id = storage_information.purchase_id;
SELECT MAX(market_value) AS highest_value, MIN(market_value) AS lowest_value FROM market_values;
SELECT metal_type, weight, purchase_date FROM purchase_details ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT metal_type, purchase_price FROM purchase_details WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY purchase_price ASC;
SELECT storage_location, storage_cost, storage_start_date FROM storage_information WHERE storage_cost < 500 ORDER BY storage_start_date DESC;
SELECT metal_type, market_value, market_date FROM market_values WHERE market_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY market_value DESC;
SELECT pd.metal_type, pd.weight, mi.market_value FROM purchase_details pd INNER JOIN market_values mi ON pd.metal_type = mi.metal_type ORDER BY pd.weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseDetails;
SELECT metal_type, purchase_date FROM PurchaseDetails WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, storage_location, storage_capacity FROM StorageInformation ORDER BY storage_capacity DESC;
SELECT metal_type, market_price, market_date FROM MarketValues WHERE market_price > 1000;
SELECT pd.purchase_date, si.storage_location, mv.market_date FROM PurchaseDetails pd JOIN StorageInformation si ON pd.id = si.id JOIN MarketValues mv ON pd.id = mv.id;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseDetails ORDER BY purchase_price DESC;
SELECT metal_type, purchase_date, purchase_price FROM PurchaseDetails WHERE purchase_price > 1000;
SELECT metal_type, market_price, market_date FROM MarketValues WHERE market_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY market_date ASC;

SELECT pd.metal_type, mi.storage_location, mv.market_price, i.investment_value FROM PurchaseDetails pd JOIN StorageInformation mi ON pd.id = mi.id JOIN MarketValues mv ON pd.id = mv.id JOIN Investments i ON pd.id = i.purchase_id ORDER BY i.investment_value DESC;

SELECT pd.metal_type, mi.storage_capacity, i.investment_value FROM PurchaseDetails pd JOIN StorageInformation mi ON pd.id = mi.id JOIN Investments i ON pd.id = i.purchase_id WHERE mi.storage_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY i.investment_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM PreciousMetals;
SELECT metal_name, purchase_price FROM PreciousMetals ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT metal_id, storage_location FROM PreciousMetals WHERE storage_location = 'Vault';
SELECT metal_name, market_price FROM PreciousMetals JOIN MarketValues ON PreciousMetals.metal_id = MarketValues.metal_id;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM Investors JOIN InvestmentHistory ON Investors.investor_id = InvestmentHistory.investor_id ORDER BY investment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PreciousMetals LIMIT 10;
SELECT metal_name, purchase_price FROM PreciousMetals ORDER BY purchase_price DESC;
SELECT metal_name, purchase_date, storage_location FROM PreciousMetals WHERE purchase_price > 1000;
SELECT metal_name, purchase_date, storage_location FROM PreciousMetals WHERE storage_location = 'Secure Vault';
SELECT investor_name, investor_email, investment_amount FROM Investors WHERE investment_amount > 50000;
